cast.overview: When vengeful General Francis X. Hummel seizes control of Alcatraz Island and threatens to launch missiles loaded with deadly chemical weapons into San Francisco, only a young FBI chemical weapons expert and notorious Federal prisoner have the skills to penetrate the impregnable island fortress and take him down.
cast.title: The Rock

details.biography:
Vanessa Marcil (born Sally Vanessa Ortiz; October 15, 1968) is an American actress. She is best known for her roles as Brenda Barrett Corinthos on General Hospital, Gina Kincaid on Beverly Hills 90210, Samantha Marquez on Las Vegas, Carla Pestalozzi in The Rock, Madison in The Bannen Way (film & TV series), and Kerry Andrews on the series High Incident.

She was married to actor Corey Feldman (m.1989;d.1993) and actor Carmine Giovinazzo (m.2010;d.2013). She also dated and was engaged to actor Brian Austin Green (1999-2003); they have 1 child together.
details.name: Vanessa Marcil
